heading: HB05105
0: AN ACT TO MODERNIZE CUSTOMS AND AUTHORIZATION PROCESSES BY ESTABLISHING THE NATIONAL SINGLE WINDOW SYSTEM, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on WAYS AND MEANS since 2017-02-28
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05105
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO MODERNIZE CUSTOMS AND AUTHORIZATION PROCESSES BY ESTABLISHING THE NATIONAL SINGLE WINDOW SYSTEM, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : " National Single Window System Act "
ABSTRACT : Provides for an environment that will allow parties involved in trade and transport to lodge standardized information in a secure, electronic single entry point to fulfill all import, export and transit related regulatory requirement in respect of each transaction; Establishes NSW System which shall be a computerized internet-based system that shall incorporate and interconnect government agencies involved in the processing and of import and export shipments; Provides that NSW System shall be concerned with the application and processing of permits, licenses and clearances for import and export, and link the final results electronically to the Customs system for the validation and verification
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BIAZON, ROZZANO RUFINO B.
DATE FILED : 2017-02-21
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS ON 2017-02-28
